name: Decayed (John Pounds)
description: Decayed is an indie exploration game about Cenay and his animal friends stopping the evil Decayer. Decayed features a unique world, challenging bosses, colorful visuals, vibrant music, and interesting characters. When you leave and the main character Cenay does not know what to do he sets off meets friends solves mysteries helps other animals and saves the forest! Play Decayed today on Mac and PC!!!
